name: UIBarAppearance
desc: An object for customizing the basic appearance of system bars.

items.name: init(idiom: UIUserInterfaceIdiom)
items.desc: Creates a new bar appearance object that targets the specified idiom.

items.name: init(barAppearance: UIBarAppearance)
items.desc: Creates a new bar appearance object by copying relevant data from the specified appearance object.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new bar appearance object containing default values.

items.name: func configureWithDefaultBackground()
items.desc: Configures the bar appearance object with default background and shadow values.

items.name: func configureWithOpaqueBackground()
items.desc: Configures the bar appearance object with a set of opaque colors that are appropriate for the current theme.

items.name: func configureWithTransparentBackground()
items.desc: Configures the bar appearance object with a transparent background and no shadow.

items.name: var backgroundEffect: UIBlurEffect?
items.desc: The blur effect to apply to the bar's background.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The background color of the bar.

items.name: var backgroundImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to display on top of the bar's background color.

items.name: var backgroundImageContentMode: UIView.ContentMode
items.desc: The content mode to use when displaying the bar's background image.

items.name: var shadowColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color to apply to the bar's custom or default shadow.

items.name: var shadowImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to use for the bar's shadow.

items.name: var idiom: UIUserInterfaceIdiom
items.desc: The idiom targeted by this bar appearance object.
